description.diamond-pearl:

its polished body.
It may also lower the
target’s accuracy.

description.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.
